version_description:
- Added Dropbox support
- Added recent and a local file list.
- Added mutli-selection / deletion
- Added search functionality
- File imports can now be cancelled
- Miscellaneous bug fixes
- Flat UI

- Added Dropbox support
- Added recent and a local file list.
- Added mutli-selection / deletion
- Added search functionality
- File imports can now be cancelled
- Miscellaneous bug fixes
- Flat UI

- Capture views no longer contain a generated 'Default' view but instead show the default view indicated by the file (if one exists).
- New functionality has been added for cycling through capture views and navigating to the default view. 
- Dropbox downloads can now be cancelled.
- New icon set. 
- A bug regarding unselectable PMI has been fixed. 
- A bug indicated improper view state after rotation has been fixed. 
- A bug regarding some models having incorrect visibility settings has been fixed. 
- Fixed PMI font filling issue

- Capture views no longer contain a generated 'Default' view but instead show the default view indicated by the file (if one exists).
- New functionality has been added for cycling through capture views and navigating to the default view. 
- Dropbox downloads can now be cancelled.
- New icon set. 
- A bug regarding unselectable PMI has been fixed. 
- A bug indicated improper view state after rotation has been fixed. 
- A bug regarding some models having incorrect visibility settings has been fixed. 
- Fixed PMI font filling issue

Added drilldown style navigation to directory view.
Fixed various bugs around capture selection and file loading.

Added drilldown style navigation to directory view.
Fixed various bugs around capture selection and file loading.

- Added support for .jt, .igs, .iges, .stp, .step, .ifc, .ifczip, .x_b, .x_t, .x_mt, and .xmt_txt formats. 
- 3D PDF Reader will auto-flip PMI when possible so its readable from front & back.
- Fixed several selection & properties querying bugs.
- Fixed several file browsing bugs.
- Fixed several file loading bugs.

- Added support for .jt, .igs, .iges, .stp, .step, .ifc, .ifczip, .x_b, .x_t, .x_mt, and .xmt_txt formats. 
- 3D PDF Reader will auto-flip PMI when possible so its readable from front & back.
- Fixed several selection & properties querying bugs.
- Fixed several file browsing bugs.
- Fixed several file loading bugs.

- Added support for different rendering modes & visual effects. 
- Fixed several file loading bugs.
- Resolved some dropbox loading issues.

- Added support for different rendering modes & visual effects. 
- Fixed several file loading bugs.
- Resolved some dropbox loading issues.
-Fix issue not being able to connect to dropbox in newer iOS versions.
-Fix issue not being able to connect to dropbox in newer iOS versions.

- Enable anti-aliasing by default to improve text readability
- Fix cases where PDF stream content wasn't being freed
- Updates to rendering engine and file parsing

- Enable anti-aliasing by default to improve text readability
- Fix cases where PDF stream content wasn't being freed
- Updates to rendering engine and file parsing

Updated rendering & file loading subsystems.
Allow users to enable & disable anti-aliasing.

Updated rendering & file loading subsystems.
Allow users to enable & disable anti-aliasing.

Updated to newest Dropbox API.
Updated HOOPS Exchange CAD File reading.
Updated HOOPS Visualize Rendering Engine.
Fixed several highlighting & selection bugs.

Updated to newest Dropbox API.
Updated HOOPS Exchange CAD File reading.
Updated HOOPS Visualize Rendering Engine.
Fixed several highlighting & selection bugs.
Fix crash on smaller form factor iPhones running iOS 11.
Fix crash on smaller form factor iPhones running iOS 11.
Fix crash on smaller form factor iPhones running iOS 11.
Fix crash on smaller form factor iPhones running iOS 11.
